sentences.en: Childhood soft like a dandelion. Along with my childhood years.
sentences.cn: 童年好像一朵柔软的蒲公英. 伴随着我童年的岁月.

sentences.en: Chrysanthemum Tea Dandelion: Dandelion ( dried ) 15 g, chrysanthemum 10 g, tea 10 g.
sentences.cn: 菊花茶蒲公英: 蒲公英 ( 干 ) 15克, 菊花10克, 茶叶10克.

sentences.en: Dandelion extract helps to protect liver and maintain a healthy digestive system.
sentences.cn: 蒲公英根精华:保护肝脏,同时维持消化系统健康.

sentences.en: Dandelion flowers can be open palms as we can be together on.
sentences.cn: 蒲公英花像我们的手掌可张开、可合上.

sentences.en: His head fuzzed like a dandelion gone to seed.
sentences.cn: 他头上全是绒毛,就像接籽的蒲公英.

sentences.en: I want to be a dandelion: a tough , resilient weed.
sentences.cn: 我却要做我的蒲公英: 多么坚韧,多么顽强.

sentences.en: It is illegal to let a dandelion grow within the city limits.
sentences.cn: 让蒲公英在市界内生长是违法的.

sentences.en: It looks like the head of a dandelion seed, you know, with all the lollipops coming out of it, and with a center in it, that we started out as the tweet.
sentences.cn: 它看起来像蒲公英的花朵，你知道的，从花朵中飞出的所有棒棒糖一样的种子都有一个中心，正如我们首发的那条微博。

sentences.en: Roasted dandelion root is an excellent coffee substitute ( and it's decaf ).
sentences.cn: 烤蒲公英根可以代替咖啡,而且还是无咖啡因的.

sentences.en: The British Dandelion Pavilion has caught much attention from the Chinese people.
sentences.cn: 英国的蒲公英馆将成为世博会的亮点之一.

sentences.en: The science fiction writer Cory Doctorow calls this " thinking a dandelion. "
sentences.cn: 科幻作家科里·多克托罗把这叫做 “ 像蒲公英一样思考 ”.

sentences.en: The seeds of dandelion were carried to the meadow by the wind.
sentences.cn: 风把蒲公英的种子吹到草地上.

sentences.en: The wind puffed away the seeds of the dandelion.
sentences.cn: 风吹散了蒲公英的种子.

sentences.en: They like to eat grasses, clover, dandelion and other plants.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢吃草, 三叶草, 蒲公英和其它植物.

sentences.en: Where dose the dandelion fluff go when it blows away?
sentences.cn: 蒲公英被吹散了后到哪里去了 呢 ?

sentences.en: While herbalists make dandelion into tincture, the leaves can be eaten raw in salad or steamed with the flowers and eaten like vegetables.
sentences.cn: 草药专家把蒲公英制成药剂, 而它的叶子可以拌入生菜沙拉中生吃或与花一起煮了当蔬菜吃.

trans.tran_en: a wild plant with a bright yellow flower which later becomes a white ball of seeds that are blown away in the wind
